ID: CUOHFYW_00
From: Bernardita Ramos <Bernardita.Ramos@chalhoub.com>
To: Sarah Alasadi <Sarah.Alasadi@chalhoub.com>
CC: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-02 14:34
Subject: KYC Requirements - Havas Worldwide Middle East FZ-LLC
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Sarah,

 

I hope you are well.

 

We are in the process of getting insurance for the years 2023-2024; please find attached a draft GIG form of HAVAS WORLDWIDE MIDDLE EAST FZ-LLC for your review before we send it for signature. I have filled out the information that I have, but as you can see from the forms, there is still information that requires your input, which I have highlighted in yellow.

 

Also we need the following documents:

 

•             VAT Registration Certificate (If applicable) – please request 

•             Valid ID copies of the authorized signatories, directors and shareholders – We have for PC and Michael but I need the passport copy of Francois, Marie, Jean, Charles Laroze, Yannick, Marie, Emile Bollore and Dany Naaman please. 

(If any of the above shareholders is a corporate entity, please provide the details of shareholders who directly or indirectly own or control more than 20% of the share capital. Please mention the percentage of shareholding against their name)

•             Memorandum & Articles of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA) – Is the attached the latest one?

chunks.text:
•             Memorandum & Articles of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA) – Is the attached the latest one? 

•             Latest Audited Financials  (In case the client is not willing to share, please specify the reason) – we need to request this from Havas 

 

Thanks. 

BERNARDITA RAMOS​​​​	
ASSOCIATE ‑ LEGAL SUPPORT	
M.C.T. FZE	
DUBAI

chunks.text:
We are in the process of getting insurance for the years 2023-2024; please find attached a draft GIG form of HAVAS WORLDWIDE MIDDLE EAST FZ-LLC for your review before we send it for signature. I have filled out the information that I have, but as you can see from the forms, there is still information that requires your input, which I have highlighted in yellow.

 

Also we need the following documents:

 

•             VAT Registration Certificate (If applicable) – please request 

•             Valid ID copies of the authorized signatories, directors and shareholders – We have for PC and Michael but I need the passport copy of Francois, Marie, Jean, Charles Laroze, Yannick, Marie, Emile Bollore and Dany Naaman please. 

(If any of the above shareholders is a corporate entity, please provide the details of shareholders who directly or indirectly own or control more than 20% of the share capital. Please mention the percentage of shareholding against their name)

•             Memorandum & Articles of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA) – Is the attached the latest one? 

•             Latest Audited Financials  (In case the client is not willing to share, please specify the reason) – we need to request this from Havas 

 

Thanks. 

BERNARDITA RAMOS​​​​

ASSOCIATE ‑ LEGAL SUPPORT

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
